title: Twisted Banshee

properties.name: description
properties.value: Twisted Banshees are stronger variants of banshees that require level 15 Slayer to kill. They are found exclusively within the Catacombs of Kourend, in a multicombat area. There is a safespot in the walkway between the two rooms. Players must wear earmuffs or a slayer helmet while fighting them in order to avoid the effects of their screams; which causes the player to take 7 damage and have their stats greatly reduced in Attack, Strength, Defence, Ranged, Magic, Prayer, and Agility with every attack received. They use magical melee, and their attacks are fairly accurate.

This article has a Slayer task guide here.
Information comparing locations for Slayer tasks will be on this page
This article is about the stronger variant. For the superior variant, see Screaming twisted banshee.
Twisted Banshee

Advanced data
Monster ID7272

Twisted Banshees are stronger variants of banshees that require level 15 Slayer to kill. They are found exclusively within the Catacombs of Kourend, in a multicombat area. There is a safespot in the walkway between the two rooms. Players must wear earmuffs or a slayer helmet while fighting them in order to avoid the effects of their screams; which causes the player to take 7 damage and have their stats greatly reduced in Attack, Strength, Defence, Ranged, Magic, Prayer, and Agility with every attack received. They use magical melee, and their attacks are fairly accurate.

As they are undead, the Crumble Undead spell and the salve amulet do work on them.

They are popular with Ironmen players due to good experience rates for their level along with dropping generous amounts of herbs, pure essence and various rune equipment.

A dwarf multi-cannon cannot be used to kill Twisted Banshees.

Drops[edit | edit source]

Drop rates estimated based on 35,191 kills from the Drop Rate Project, unless otherwise cited.

The average Twisted Banshee kill is worth 2,197.98.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • A Banshee is a female spirit in irish folklore. Her shrieks are said to foreshadow the imminent passing of a family member.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
13 January 2021
(update)

Twisted Banshee were made into spectral creatures.
